---
title: Data 303 Book Reports
subtitle: Spring 2023
title-block-banner: true
format:
  html:
    theme: yeti
embed-resources: true
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

files <- dir()

for (f in files) {
  if (dir.exists(f)) {
    cat(paste0("\n\n## [",f,"](",f,")"))  
    docs <- dir(f, pattern = "ptx|pdf|html|qmd|docx")
    for (d in docs) {
    cat(paste0("\n* [",d,"](", f, "/", d,")"))  
    }
  }
}

```
